data.title: Cassandra Lynde - Director of Marketing at Lug
data.meta_description: Cassandra Lynde has a diverse work experience, having held positions in marketing, accounting, logistics, and blogging.
data.text:
Cassandra Lynde has a diverse work experience, having held positions in marketing, accounting, logistics, and blogging. In 2018, they were the Director of Marketing for Lug, where they were responsible for directing, planning, and coordinating marketing efforts for social channels, key accounts, and eCommerce efforts. Prior to that, they were the Accounts Receivable Clerk, Accounts Payable Clerk, and Logistics Associate for Tank Truck Transport Inc. from 2013-2017. In 2017, they were the Marketing and Content Manager and Marketing and Content Intern for Catch Media Lab. In 2016, they were the Social Media Marketing Manager for Beautifull Boundaries. In 2015, they were the Freelance Blogger for www.fortheloveofblonde.com and a Correspondent for Spread Media.

Cassandra Lynde has a diverse educational background. Cassandra began their studies in 2009, when they earned their Ontario High School Diploma from Cardinal Ambrozic Catholic Secondary School. Cassandra then attended Ryerson University from 2013-2014, where they obtained their Bachelor of Commerce (BCom) in Retail Management from the Ted Rogers School of Management. In 2014, Cassandra transferred to York University, where they graduated with a Bachelor of Arts (B.A.) in Communication Studies in 2017. Cassandra then continued their studies at George Brown College Continuing Education, where they are currently enrolled in a Marketing Certificate program. In 2021, Cassandra also obtained a PR Certificate from The G. Raymond Chang School of Continuing Education at Toronto Metropolitan University.
